content.query:
USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-- USERS--
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/users/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_users3(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50),
    DownVotes NVARCHAR(50),
    LastAccessDate NVARCHAR(50),
    Reputation NVARCHAR(50),
    UpVotes NVARCHAR(50),
    Views NVARCHAR(50),
    AccountId NVARCHAR(50),
    Email NVARCHAR(80)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_users3;
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_dim1 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_dim1/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_users3;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_users_dim1;


-- BADGES--
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/badges/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_badges1(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Name NVARCHAR(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50),
    Date NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/badges/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_badges1;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_badges_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_badges_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_badges1;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_badges_dim;


-- COMMENTS --
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/comments/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_comments(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50),
    PostId NVARCHAR(50),
    Score NVARCHAR(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/comments/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_comments;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_comments_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_comments_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_comments;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_comments_dim;

-- LINKTYPES --
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/linktypes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_linktypes(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Type NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/linktypes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT * FROM master_party.dim_linktypes;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_linktypes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_linktypes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT * FROM master_party.dim_linktypes;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_linktypes_dim;

-- POSTLINKS--
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/postlinks/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_postlinks(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50),
    PostId NVARCHAR(50),
    RelatedPostId NVARCHAR(50),
    LinkTypeId NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/postlinks/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_postlinks;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_postlinks_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_postlinks_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_postlinks;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_postlinks_dim;

-- POSTTYPES--
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/posttypes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_posttypes1(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Type NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/posttypes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_posttypes1;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_posttypes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_posttypes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_posttypes1;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_posttypes_dim;


-- VOTES --
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/votes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_votes(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    PostId NVARCHAR(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50),
    BountyAmount NVARCHAR(50),
    VoteTypeId NVARCHAR(50),
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/votes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_votes;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_votes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_votes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_votes;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_votes_dim;

-- VOTETYPES--
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/votetypes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_votetypes(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Name NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/votetypes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_votetypes;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_votetypes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_votetypes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_votetypes;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_votetypes_dim;
